Reference: Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) Research Network. (2008). Comprehensive genomic characterization defines human glioblastoma genes and core pathways.?Nature,?455(7216), 1061.
breastCancerNKI: Genexpression dataset published by van't Veer et al. [2002] and van de Vijver et al. [2002] (NKI).. R package version 1.14.0, http://compbio.dfci.harvard.edu/.
breastCancerUPP: Gene expression dataset published by Sotiriou et al. [2005] (UPP).. R package version 1.14.0,?http://compbio.dfci.harvard.edu/.
breastCancerUNT: Gene expression dataset published by Sotiriou et al. [2007] (UNT).. R package version 1.14.0,?http://compbio.dfci.harvard.edu/.
breastCancerTRANSBIG: Gene expression dataset published by Sotiriou et al. [2007] (TRANSBIG).. R package version 1.14.0,?http://compbio.dfci.harvard.edu/.
breastCancerMAINZ: Gene expression dataset published by Schmidt et al. [2008] (MAINZ).. R package version 1.14.0, http://compbio.dfci.harvard.edu/.
breastCancerVDX: Gene expression datasets published by Wang et al. [2005] and Minn et al. [2007] (VDX).. R package version 1.14.0, http://compbio.dfci.harvard.edu/.
